**For Repository Maintainer:**
Once reviewed and approved:
1. Go to [Settings → Collaborators](../../settings/access)
2. Add user `@username` with appropriate permissions
3. Comment on this issue: "✅ Access granted! Welcome aboard. Check out [QUICK_START.md](../boards/microchip/samv71-xult-clickboards/QUICK_START.md) to get started."
4. Close issue
